text: - My name is Chelsi Brown.

I'm a Cloud Solutions
Center District Manager.

I've been at AWS just
over a year and a half.

Before AWS, I was working
in the data center space,
completely opposite of what I'm doing now.
A lot of the customers

in the space that I had
were in data center,
and because of the pandemic,

it accelerated them
out of the data center.

So I thought maybe I should
look at other options
outside of the data center as well,
and that's what landed me here at AWS.

My team works specifically with
enterprise-engaged customers
who are sort of on their foundational side
of the cloud journey.

So being a part of that process
from end to end is exciting.
It can be really fun,

and there's a lot to uncover
there, a ton of opportunity.

So my team is not your
standard insight seller role.
We are doing all of the same motions
as regular field account managers

or just account managers
that are in territory.
Here at AWS, you get access

to a lot of very interesting
thought leaders in the space,
cloud and innovation,
and you can be a part of that and learn

and kind of grow your career
based on just connecting
with a bunch of different people

in different industries,
different backgrounds.

So if you have a strong acumen
for learn and be curious,
this is the place to be

because it's a constant
learning, learning and curiosity.
(light music)
